title: If amumu was a pokemon...
body:
[](http://www.lol3dskins.altervista.org/AmumuLoadScreen.jpg)
He would be a yamask
http://pa1.narvii.com/6082/95fc2ec367d31f069150745197c6ba9cd8e95240_hq.gif
Because yamask is the saddest desert pokemon.

replies.body:
I wanna see a Zed Pokemon.

We already saw Yasuo right?
I'm going in alphabetical order of champions, so I never brought up yasuo.

Surprised no one brought this one up.
http://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/1/12/356Dusclops.png/250px-356Dusclops.png
feels I def agree yamask but looks wise his evolved form seems more suitable
I do agree with that as well, it's just one thing that made me pick yamask over co%%%rigus, and that is its face. cofa is kind mean looking, whereas yamask is always so sad.

I would say con%%%rigus because of bandages.

EDIT: Wow part of the name got censored just like in the GTS
originally thought co%%%rigus, but co%%%rigus looks more menacing than sad, and amumu isn't very menacing.
